structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: City may acquire franchise to furnish water and light to another city.
law.text: Any city may acquire a franchise to furnish water and light to any other city, in the same manner that any private corporation or individual may acquire such a franchise.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2741a-1.
